function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments:
{"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inconsistency in the scale of projects that design professionals work on may hinder the implementation of regenerative aspirations and cooperative networked infrastructure integration.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in built environment","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Slow assimilation of green building strategies within existing design context","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient mitigation progress in building practices","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 virus transmission in built environments","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infectious phase of sars-cov-2 before symptoms appear","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of entire human population to sars-cov-2 infection","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to distinguish the effectiveness of non-pharmaceutical interventions npis on sars-cov-2 transmission and covid-19 dynamics","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in disentangling the impact of individual npis due to non-random allocation and dependency on the state of the epidemic","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sparse and noisy data for estimating transmission rates","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unknown parametric form of transmission rates","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of dynamic modeling and population-based kalman filter approach introduces a risk of model complexity and interpretation challenges.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex modeling of disease dynamics","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Model measurement errors","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The potential spread of contagious diseases due to the multiple data series in multiple regions being observed together","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assumption of randomly distributed initial uncertainty variables with unknown covariance","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Delayed lockdowns can lead to a continued increase in transmission rates of contagious diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Estimation of transmission rates using population-based kalman filters may result in inaccurate data if not properly validated","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High estimated basic and effective reproductive numbers r0 and reff","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High attack rates at various time points","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate measurement of the transmission rate from hospital data","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on parameter values from the scientific literature","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High attack rates and seroprevalence in the population","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Estimation of high average national basic reproductive number r0","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission rate estimation may be inaccurate","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of outdated or invalid models","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hospital-acquired covid-19 due to airborne transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of other microbial bioaerosols","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air changes in 
’surge’ wards and intensive care units icu .","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited data on the effectiveness of engineering solutions for improving ventilation and air sterilization.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential exposure to sars-cov-2 and microbial bioaerosols in a covid-19 
’surge’ ward.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Capture of airborne viruses","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2 in a hospital surge ward and icu","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in the ward before air filter activation","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to detect sars-cov-2 rna on control sampler","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High levels of viral, bacterial, and fungal pathogens detected in the air samples from the surge ward","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in the air samples from the surge icu","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne circulation of sars-cov-2 in hospital environment","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Aerosol generating procedures increasing respiratory aerosols","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in the air of a ward managing patients with covid-19.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of a range of bacteria, yeasts, and other respiratory viruses in the air of hospital rooms.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty regarding the impact of air filtration on nosocomial infections.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of evidence for sars-cov-2 removal by portable air filtration devices","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain optimal air changes required to remove detectable pathogens","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential artefactual reduction in the viability of sampled virus by air sampling devices","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of airborne sars-cov-2 rna in repurposed covid-19 
’surge ward’","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased frequency of garden usage may lead to higher contact and potential spread of contagious diseases in shared spaces.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Bmi measurement using nurse-measured height and weight may lead to inaccurate results.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contact among gardeners may lead to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High frequency of garden usage may increase the risk of exposure to airborne diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"}]}
